snippet: The FiveThirtyEight forecast model now gives Republicans just about a 16 percent chance of winning control of the Senate. This is a precipitous drop from just two months ago.
abstract: The FiveThirtyEight forecast model now gives Republicans just about a 16 percent chance of winning control of the Senate. This is a precipitous drop from just two months ago.

headline.main: G.O.P. Senate Hopes Fade, Even as Romney's Rise, Polls Show
headline.print_headline: Romney’s Bounce Isn’t Helping in Senate Races, Polls Show
